attributes.review: i downloaded this app w high hopes. i just wanted to keep up to date with news and current events. before i downloaded the app my phone’s battery percentage was at 96%, and as soon as i opened the app my percentage was 3%!!!! so i plugged it in and it started charging at a slow pace. every-time i opened my phone a big scary cheeto man w some string draping over his head popped up and my phone started making a loud screeching sound! it scared me. i tried deleting the app, but it won’t let me for some reason and every-time i try my couch elevates and flies across the room to the nearest person. i had to take my 7 year old daughter the the ER AND my pet cockroach bc they were both heavily injured. this app is awful and scary. do NOT get it!! they should delete this demonic app as soon as possible!
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review:
I- nvm 🥱👁👄👁💄💋🧚... I was with my friend when I saw this app on the beloved Apple App Store and I almost vomited from the DISSATISFACTION I have received from the HORRIFIC logo design! 🗣👣🥱😳😤😡🤬 We decided to take a walk in the alley way to forget about the tragedy that has entered our line of vision when my girlfriend sent me a picture of herself with DONALD J. TRUMP HIMSELF! 🤯🥵😳😭😫💩💀 I told him that I’d do ANYTHING for him to leave my girlfriend alone.🤕😰😤😔🤔😭💀He said that I had to DOWNLOAD HIS ATROCIOUS LOOKING APP to get rid of this curse that has been brought upon me. My friend started to try and KILL MY DOG too 
and when I told him to please stop,✋🛑 he told me to download the app! 👿🤬😡😤😫😑😬🙄 I finally brought myself to download the rage inducing app so the curse would be lifted. I am writing this review to spread awareness to this CURSED app. I am not a VICTIM, but I sure am a SURVIVOR!😖✊🏿😩👁👄👁
attributes.title: I- nvm

attributes.review: The moment I opened the app I saw a Orange Cheeto 😖 my poor eyes couldn’t handle it, anyhow the Cheeto started offending me by saying that my queen woman self shouldn’t have the right to own that apps and that he was gonna build a protecting wall so I couldn’t touch it, however me being my normal friendly self decided to crush that Cheeto before this infected my phone, my next decision was to delete the app right away. I went to sleep and started having night mares. I he started attacking my night mates and started saying that Red and Yellow Cheetos shouldn’t exist and they didn’t had the right to survive. I woke sweating and decide to take a walk outside at the beach. And than I SAW huge ORAGE WHALES praising the Orange Cheeto  like dogs. I was impressed of how can they praise THAT type of Cheeto...I got so scared and vomited...I’m technically dead.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING!!!

attributes.review: First off when I opened the app these green stink lines stared to come out of my phone.  Luckily I had a life vest on so I was protected. Sadly my cat was not so lucky. The green stink lines grabbed him and almost threw him out of the window. But luckily my mom ran with anti Cheeto spray and killed the stink line.  But me and my poor, poor cat were severely traumatized. After that me and my cat had to go to couples therapy 200,000,000 times a month.  Then a month later the app just randomly appeared on my phone it was almost like the app was calling me, hypnotizing me.  I opened the app and almost got sucked into my phone.  The therapist had to use her magical fairy powers to get me out of my now Cheeto land phone.  We had to break my phone into little pieces and burn it after than.  And now I’m writing this on my iPad.
attributes.title: Disgusting app🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to keep up with current today news. I opened the app and the first thing I noticed was that it made my phone horribly slow. Then there was this orange dude trying to sell me skin care products. Why would I want skin care products on a news app? He started explaining how I would have skin just like his. This was a disgusting thought to me, given the fact that his skin was a horrid color. It was as if he used a very large amount of orange tanning spray, then left it on for too long. This app was not at all what I expected and I’m very shocked and disappointed. Shouldn’t the president of the United States have better control over his app, and a better description of what his app is. I thought it was news, but apparently I was wrong. One star.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL. VERY DISAPPOINTING

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to, oh, you know, do research. nvm it was tiktok. thats besides the point. attributes.title: WORSE THAN THE ORANGE 🍊 HIMSELF

attributes.review: Let’s just start with opening up this app I saw a scary Cheeto guy pop up on my screen and it startled 😱 me so much that I feel into a pot hole which was really a portal to another dimension...there I saw aliens worshipping a orange fella in a wig from wish, before I saw to much I hopped thru the portal again and I was back home but my head started to blow up like a ballon bc of the trauma I endured👁👄👁 I quickly drove to the hospital but it was to late when I got there my head exploded into hundreds of little pieces. Luckily there was a witch doctor there and he was able to put me back together but my face will never be the same.👺 I now do physical therapy so I can eat and move my face better. But I will never forget the pain this app put me thru don’t dare download it unless you like pain...
attributes.title: This app ruined my life 😾

attributes.review: i wanted to use this app to look for upcoming rally’s and more information about mr president cheeto, but when i opened the app it first showed his micro sized penis. it was disgusting and horrifying to think our president would do such a thing. i click past it only to see more pornography!! WHAT IS THIS??? i wanted to use this app to know when the upcoming rallies will happen. i continued on in this app, hoping to find something good, only to see that they are trying to get all of my information, like my credit card info and my home address. i do not want to give my personal information to an app that i thought was just to give me new updates about the trump 2020 campaign. overall this was a horrible experience and this app needs to be taken down IMMEDIATELY!!!
attributes.title: you tried but no thanks

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever seen when I open it glitches and goes to dark and when I leave the app it asks for my info and I think it’s not necessary to ask for my information and when I try to see where trump is gonna be at its doesn’t show any location it only talks about how good he is being a disgusting person to younger girls and it says that he cheated on his SAT exams even he talks bad about the people and care about I truly think that this app doesn’t works at all I’m definitely disappointed. 🤬 oh another thing it show how naked he gets and the way he gets sprayed tan like I thought this app was for everyone like underage and even for adults I think this is inappropriate shake my head 🤦‍♂️
attributes.title: Doesn’t work at all  I’m so disappointed and mad I wasted my time on this app
